text:
$ xrandr
xrandr: Failed to get size of gamma for output default
Screen 0: minimum 640 x 480, current 640 x 480, maximum 640 x 480
default connected primary 640x480+0+0 0mm x 0mm
   640x480       73.00* 

$ cvt 2560 1440 143.91
# 2560x1440 143.78 Hz (CVT) hsync: 225.45 kHz; pclk: 808.00 MHz
Modeline "2560x1440_143.91"  808.00  2560 2792 3072 3584  1440 1443 1448 1568 -hsync +vsync

$ xrandr --newmode "2560x1440_143.91"  808.00  2560 2792 3072 3584  1440 1443 1448 1568 -hsync +vsync
xrandr: Failed to get size of gamma for output default

$ xrandr --addmode DP-1  2560x1440_143.91
xrandr: Failed to get size of gamma for output default
xrandr: cannot find output "DP-1"

$ xrandr
xrandr: Failed to get size of gamma for output default
Screen 0: minimum 640 x 480, current 640 x 480, maximum 640 x 480
default connected primary 640x480+0+0 0mm x 0mm
   640x480       73.00* 
  2560x1440_143.91 (0x28a) 808.000MHz -HSync +VSync
        h: width  2560 start 2792 end 3072 total 3584 skew    0 clock 225.45KHz
        v: height 1440 start 1443 end 1448 total 1568           clock 143.78Hz
title: Screen Resoultion problem Ubuntu 16.04
